attributes.action: GP's are paid to much to pass the book
attributes.additional_details: people who are off sick from work are left on the shelf and made to look like wasters! like those who have never/will or want to work. These sick people are waiting on the nhs for a answer so they can return to work. They are out of work for so long waiting, on the nhs appointment shambles they seek to find other employment that will suit the illness only to be put onto a must attend rota at there local job centre even though they are still sick. and threatened every time they don't attend a meeting that the money they are claiming which they  have paid into this horrid country the last how many  years of employment will be stopped!!
